titles.title: A bill to extend the existing suspension of duty on stuffed dolls, certain toy figures, and the skins thereof.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8826)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1997, the suspension of duty on stuffed dolls, certain toy figures, and doll skins.
